name: MaskedHero's
author: ZeBigCheese
notes: Might be the first masked hero KoG here, idk. Deck is pretty solid. Played more of a control version. Beat all the meta decks, but I will admit that I got pretty lucky vs Sylvans, twice (they milled terribly). The deck is fun and works well. If you have 3 Anki, play 3. Only having two almost cost me the game in one of my matches
